document.docAuthor: Gobert, Stefan, Diez, Yander L., Monnens, Marlies, Reygel, Patrick, Van Steenkiste, Niels W. L., Leander, Brian S. & Artois, Tom
document.docTitle: Cheliplana asinaraensis Gobert & Diez & Monnens & Reygel & Van Steenkiste & Leander & Artois 2021, n. sp.
document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the genus Cheliplana de Beauchamp, 1927 (Rhabdocoela: Schizorhynchia), with the description of six new species

taxonomicName.authorityName: Gobert & Diez & Monnens & Reygel & Van Steenkiste & Leander & Artois

subSubSection.paragraph:
Species of
Cheliplana
with a 50-μm-long proboscis, consisting of 20–22-μm-long hook supports and 38-μm-long hooks. Testis unpaired. Cirrus ~60 μm long and consisting of two distinct parts: a proximal region showing a longitudinal striation and measuring ~49 μm, and a distal, crescent-shaped region, armed with lamellar as well as bristle-like spines.
